about_the_game:
Chances are you have asked yourself what it would be like to be a wizard. Or you might have seen a little duckling, and wondered what it would be like to be a duck. Here, you can experience what you likely never asked: what it's like to be both!

Of course that involves magic, having a dog, doing duck stuff, and pushing boulders and boxes because the mailing system is on a long holiday.

Things you will be able to do in Wizarducks and the Lost Hat:

  • Learn an array of magic spells you can learn for both combat and exploration

  • Explore a wide world with secrets to be found, things are not always what they seem.

  • Solve puzzles to solve, push blocks, bonk some bugs, and trigger the photic sneeze reflex (yes, that is a thing) in some weird statues.

  • Fight bosses, managers, and general supervisors. Some because the story told you to, and some because they might be giving your friends a hard time.

  • Enhance your spell-casting abilities. Maybe you'll be able to see old areas in a new light!

  • Learn about the world around you as you revitalize your hometown. If you befriend the villagers, they might teach you a few things!

  • Run errands for some NPCs (Or not Most of them aren't your mom).

  • Complete an album full of trading cards featuring pixel art of colorful birds. Can you find them all?

  • Unveil the mysteries of your new home, full of rooms and dangers that you were not aware of. Maybe that haunted furniture was just in style years ago?

  • Take a break from adventuring by tending to your garden. You never know when your favorite fruits or flowers might come in handy!

  • Take your faithful dog along with you on your adventures. He's a good boy. You should give him pets!

  • Enjoy the aesthetic of pixel art games of old blended with 3D elements

  • Find your hat. What kind of wizard would you even be without a hat?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: 3rd gen i5 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2500 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on both arch and debian bases. Should run on most distros without tweaks.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: 3rd gen i5 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is usually CPU-bound rather than GPU-bound

short_description: Have daily adventures in dungeons and exploring unmapped areas, some far away, some hidden in your own home. Cast spells to fight enemies and to solve puzzles blocking your way. Befriend the villagers, help them decorate the town. Oh, and pet your magic dog, he likes it.
